name: Virtual Reality Party
description: Experience the thrill of virtual reality with our VR party package. We provide you with the latest VR headsets, controllers, and games for up to 10 guests. You can choose from a variety of genres, such as action, adventure, horror, racing, and more. Whether you want to explore exotic worlds, fight zombies, or drive supercars, we have something for everyone.

details.equipment: 10 VR headsets, 10 controllers, 10 gaming laptops, 10 speakers, 1 projector
details.requirements: A spacious room with power outlets and internet access

name: Gaming Tournament
description: Compete with your friends and other gamers in our gaming tournament service. We organize and host tournaments for popular games, such as Fortnite, Call of Duty, FIFA, etc. You can choose the game, the format, the prize pool, and the number of participants. We provide you with the gaming consoles, monitors, controllers, headsets, and live streaming equipment.

details.location: Our gaming center or your preferred venue
details.equipment: 20 gaming consoles (PS5 or Xbox Series X), 20 monitors, 20 controllers, 20 headsets, 1 live streaming setup
details.games: Fortnite, Call of Duty: Warzone, FIFA 22, Apex Legends, etc.
details.requirements: A large room with power outlets and internet access

name: Board Game Night
description: Enjoy a fun and relaxing night with our board game service. We provide you with a wide selection of board games, from classics to modern hits. You can play with up to 12 guests and choose from different themes, such as strategy, trivia, party, cooperative, etc. We also provide you with snacks and drinks to keep you energized.

details.equipment: 50 board games (Monopoly, Catan, Trivial Pursuit, Codenames, Pandemic, etc.), snacks (chips, popcorn, candy), drinks (soda, juice)
details.games: Any board game from our collection

name: Escape Room Challenge
description: Test your wits and teamwork skills with our escape room challenge service. We provide you with a fully immersive and interactive escape room experience for up to 8 guests. You can choose from different themes and difficulty levels such as mystery horror adventure etc. You have to solve puzzles and clues within a limited time to escape.

details.location: Our escape room center or your preferred venue
details.equipment: 1 escape room setup (props locks cameras) 1 game master
details.games: The Lost Treasure of Atlantis The Haunted Mansion The Secret Agent Mission etc.

name: Retro Arcade Party
description: Relive the nostalgia of the golden age of arcade games with our retro arcade party service. We provide you with a variety of arcade machines and cabinets for up to 15 guests. You can play classic games from the 80s and 90s such as Pac-Man Donkey Kong Street Fighter Mortal Kombat etc. We also provide you with tokens tickets and prizes.

details.location: Our arcade center or your preferred venue
details.equipment: 15 arcade machines/cabinets (Pac-Man Donkey Kong Street Fighter Mortal Kombat etc.) tokens tickets prizes
details.games: Any arcade game from our collection
details.requirements: A spacious room with power outlets

name: Laser Tag Battle
description: Have a blast with our laser tag battle service. We provide you with the laser tag equipment vests and guns for up to 20 guests. You can choose from different modes such as team deathmatch capture the flag free for all etc. You can also customize the arena with obstacles lights and sounds.

details.location: Our laser tag center or your preferred venue
details.equipment: 20 laser tag vests and guns 1 arena setup (obstacles lights sounds)
details.games: Any laser tag mode from our options
details.requirements: A large room or outdoor space with power outlets
